channel.title: Posts on Fantasy Banter
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Fantasy Banter

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Hello World! By way of introduction, my name is Paul ‘PMAC’ McGrath. I am a data analytics enthusiast and AFL supercoach fanatic. My tool of choice is R and I have implemented this site through a series of Rmarkdown files using Blogdown. I don’t fancy myself as much of a wordsmith so the majority of my posts are going to be focused on data elements. The purpose of this site is talk all things Supercoach.
